title: Alt Tab
body: When i tab into league or when i tab out. There comes a black screen for around 2 sek before the tabbing is finished. I have my League in full screen mode. Is there any way to fix this without going to borderless or anything like that?

replies.body: Most likely that is just happening since your pc is taking a bit to actually load everything back up. It might be happening if you also have a lot of programs running in the background, so let's go ahead and try a [**clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974#wq7) really quick.
